name: Nuun Sport  & Caffeine Electrolyte Replacement Tablets Wildberry
description:
Electrolyte-replacing drink tablets with caffeine, in a little portable tube. Great for endurance events, long bike rides and hikes, or any other event that requires a quick boost.40mg of caffeine per servingRevised formula contains no preservatives or artificial sweeteners, now contains non-GMO dextrose and stevia as sweeteners and organic green tea extract for a caffeine hit.Ingredients: citric acid, dextrose, natural flavors, beet juice powder (for color), monk fruit extract, stevia leaf extract,avocado oil, riboflavin (for color).
